artist: Artist: Veronika Schäpers; Author: Yōko Tawada
description: clear acrylic box containing two books of work; opaque circle decal on cover; box is wrapped with black cloth; lender's archive #001
markings:
Japanese volume: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 13
German volume: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: 13
medium: Unique text fragments, black ink and transparent glue-ink mixture, oiled paper; letterpress; with card stock jacket and acrylic case
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Japanese volume: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Veronika Schäpers [along with a name in Japanese characters]
German volume: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Veronika Schäpers [along with a name in Japanese characters]
title: Okonomiyaki (Fried as You Like It)
